page.title: 06WEST CORNWALL HOSPITAL
page.content: The main building is over{100 years old.The most expensive piece of equipment is a heart monitor which can show four people's heart beat at the same time.The worst operation to do was on a small baby.Ten nurses work in the children's ward,and they love it. In the peak summer season,by the end of July,624 people go into casualty. The hospital does not own any ambulances,they are owned by the Cornwall and Isles of Scilly Authority.If there are too many people in the hospital,the staff have a meeting to send home the people who do not need an operation.In the hospital there is a place called the H.D.U. which stands for High Dependency Unit. In the hospital the most dangerous disease was septicaemia. Alv. The hospital is on the main road,just North of the town centre.
